website_summaries.verdict: Ladder has an expansion feature to allow you to fit it to your trampoline height.
pros: Flat stairs with an anti-slip coating
cons: Hooks may not fit well on all trampolines

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the frustration. Spend a little more for a better ladder.
customer_reviews.text: Very poor craftsmanship. The hardware was very difficult to use due to screws being to short. Had to use clamps to hold it in place. Instructions were awful. Kids mention it feels wobbly. In hindsight, I would have spent a little more for a higher quality ladder. Have a feeling this will not last very long.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent
customer_reviews.text: Dies what it needs to do. Took a star off because the plastic was torn on both sides and I was afraid it would fall off. Two weeks later it’s still there.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not high enough wish it was a little bit more taller.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed Alvi

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. Product arrived fast. Easy to put together. Fits our 17ft round trampoline perfectly. Our kids enter and exit with ease. It works great for all ages. Picture doesn't show very well how the rungs on the ladder are flat.
customer_reviews.author: LovelyNative

customer_reviews.title: Shorter than the description
customer_reviews.text: We have a 15' square trampoline that sits 41" off the ground. I purchased this ladder based on the description which stated 38" and can be extended to 42". That could not be further from what i received. The ladder I received is 32" in length and can be extended to 36" so it doesn't even come close. The ladder seems sturdy and I like the flat steps but I cannot use it as it does not match the description.
customer_reviews.author: A. Comire

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had bought one sooner!
customer_reviews.text: This is very helpful in getting kids onto the trampoline. We always just pulled up a lawn chair or they just scrambled in, but this is much better. Wish I had thought to buy one sooner.
customer_reviews.author: RF

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality ladder, easy to assemble. No trace of rust so far (despite a lot of rain).
customer_reviews.author: Frederic Girardeau Montaut

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't fit like a glove but it does the job. Set up was easy and kids don't have to use a chair to get in anymore
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Ok item, except it keeps loosing screws
customer_reviews.text: All the screws keep falling out and getting lost in the lawn....quite frustrating to have to keep replacing them... Otherwise ok item
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The bolts are not really long enough it was a pain in the behind to get the nuts on.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S.

customer_reviews.title: BOTH ENDCAPS ARE BROKEN-right out of the package!
customer_reviews.text: product seems sturdy, but both end caps are cracked and almost completely broken. Can't seem to reach a live person on YJ corp. phone. Doesn't seem worth it to ship the whole thing back for end caps, but they are a critical component of the ladder. Very frustrating...Amazon, help!
customer_reviews.author: Dan J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, easy to use, hasn't rusted in the year we've had it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Michelle Naylor

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: Product appeared to be a return. Some items scuffed. Two of ten cap nuts broken off. Understood when putting it together. Holes are poorly aligned, hooks bent in slightly wrong direction, bolts too short to catch threads correctly with the spring washers in place. Consider it disposable.
customer_reviews.author: DTV guy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for our trampoline. My 2 year old has no trouble getting up and down now. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Nikolaus Home

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!! Works well with the trampoline that I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Good concept, bad hardware
customer_reviews.text: Besides the dirty packaging the bolts are just marginally long enough for the cap screws; I'll have to buy longer bolts :( Lock nuts and longer bolts would have been a better idea that the short bolts with cap nuts, ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi-yooper

customer_reviews.title: Poor Product
customer_reviews.text: This ladder did not work when we put it together. It broke as soon as a little pressure was applied to it with my hand!!! Not worth the money. Buy one that is more durable!
customer_reviews.author: Ms-Mom

product_meta.title: JumpKing Flat Step Trampoline Ladder
product_meta.description:
JumpKing Trampoline Flat Step Ladder ACC-LADFS 
•Ladder expands from 36 inches to 38 inches to fit most trampolines. 
•High quality, sturdy construction 
•Flat Steps 
•Easy Assembly
feature_bullets: Expands from 38 inches to 45 inches to fit most trampolines

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
